constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 127 (Friday, July 29, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CAWTHORN:
H.R. 8603
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8
[Page H7539]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: To direct the President to take such actions as may be necessary to prohibit the purchase of public or private real estate located in the United States by an foreign governments.
